title: Kaizen Daily
description: An advanced, open-source machine learning platform built with Python and React for creating, training, and deploying next-generation AI models with ease. It features a collaborative environment and real-time analytics.

features.title: Interactive Model Builder
features.description: A drag-and-drop interface for designing complex neural networks without writing any code.

features.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor model training progress, performance metrics, and resource utilization in real-time.

features.title: One-Click Deployment
features.description: Seamlessly deploy trained models to a scalable production environment using Docker containers.

features.title: Collaborative Workspaces
features.description: Share projects, datasets, and models with your team to foster collaboration and accelerate research.
